text: O te, kotoryye uverovali! Yesli kto-nibud' iz vas otstupit ot svoyey religii, to Allakh privedet drugikh lyudey, kotorykh On budet lyubit' i kotoryye budut lyubit' Yego. Oni budut smirenny pered veruyushchimi i nepreklonny pered neveruyushchimi, budut srazhat'sya na puti Allakha i ne budut boyat'sya poritsaniya poritsayushchikh. Takova milost' Allakha, kotoruyu On daruyet, komu pozhelayet. Allakh - Ob"yemlyushchiy, Znayushchiy
